QuestData.Title: An Urgent Meeting
QuestData.Description:
I've been looking for you all over Orgrimmar, $n.
Warlord Grimaxe has delivered her mission report to the warchief. The Horde has need of you once again.
I was ordered to find you and deliver the message without delay. It has been an honor to fight alongside you, $n.
Lok-tar ogar!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Warlord Breka Grimaxe at Grommash Hold.

Objectives.Objective: Find Warlord Breka Grimaxe at Grommash Hold
